attributes.action: Stand down and bring William Hague to the position, as Prime Minister
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We ask of the Prime Minister, Gordon Brown, to stand down and for the Labour Party to recruit William Hague as an MP, and to become Prime Minister of the United Kingdom.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
